title: what is Max operating temperature of TASSIMO Bosch My Way [closed]
content:
Closed. This question is off-topic. It is not currently accepting answers.
                                
                            











 Questions asking for help reverse-engineering a specific system are off-topic unless they demonstrate an understanding of the concepts involved and clearly identify a specific problem.


Closed 1 year ago.







                        Improve this question
                    



Having read the articles regarding changes to barcodes on Tassimo Coffee Machines, I was wanting to know if the water temperature could be changed to a hotter setting if possible via the barcodes.
Unfortunately I am not experienced in editing code as described.
Thanks for your time.
Kind regards
Ivor Mac
